bio: My name is Duong Chi Thang. My hometown in Hue. Currently I am a 3rd year student of Hoc Vien Ki Thuat Mat Ma. My major is Information Security but I chose to learn web programming because it suits me.
My hobbies are football, listening to music, communicating with people,...
